project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests)
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Process and format the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Display the formatted weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the function that fetches and processes the weather data
Execute tests to ensure functionality and data correctness
